header1_subtitle: volem fomentar l'intercanvi d'idees sobre networking al voltant d'una comunitat oberta en l'ambit de Barcelona
header2_subtitle: tots els temes sobre networking estan sobre la taula, especialment les últimes tendències a nivell mundial
mission_title: Impulsar una comunitat oberta sobre networking a Barcelona
mission_description:
After 3 years setting up a local community of Internet techies in Barcelona, around the SDN and Network Programmability MeetUp in Barcelona, we are now expanding scope to embrace a wider set of topics related to Internet, Networking and Software. To reinforce the scope change, we are also rebranding the name of the group, as NetBcn.
This open group is not a substitute of the traditional Internet Network Operators Group (ie. ESNOG) as we are interested in all the broad range of technologies and uses-cases that are flourishing that are related to networking, from low-level ASIC programming to application level innovations.
We will organise after-work events with a changing format: a workshop or a tutorial on popular or emerging technologies, a panel of experts sharing tips to advance your career, a couple of presentations or simply let’s chill together over craft beers in an informal way.
The main goal of the community is promote experience and knowledge sharing among us, and from abroad experts that uninterestedly would like to share their time with us.
Be tuned as new events are coming (using the same meetup platform as before to handle registration)
BCN SDN meetup is dead, long life NetBcn!
contact_message: Contacta amb nosaltres per email o slack
contact_title: Som gent amb ganes d'aprendre i compartir coneixement
contact_text: Com a organització sense cap ànim de lucre, no tenim altre propòsit que promoure l'intercanvi de coneixement sobre les tecnologies de comunicacions fomentant la col.laboració a nivell local i internacional
